# - Climate regions according to the KÃ¶ppen climate classification
# - <climate region> = <notation> <attributes> <possible locations>
# - Info and formula (in English): https://www.britannica.com/science/Koppen-climate-classification

# - Resources on agricultural efficiency: http://sites.tufts.edu/willmasters/files/2010/06/MastersAndWeibe-ClimateAndAgProductivity.pdf
# - efficiency and sizes are estimates here (not much info on ecology of ME avaiable, none in terms of numbers)
# - https://decolonialatlas.wordpress.com/2015/03/11/global-agriculture-where-we-grow-what-we-grow-and-how-we-grow/

# - https://64.media.tumblr.com/6860d4bd5ca674c81d18124955b042da/tumblr_p0bye3T1Pr1ug4fnjo1_1280.jpg

arctic_polar_climate = # EF polar regions
{
	farm_rgo_size = -0.45
	farm_rgo_eff = -0.98
	mine_rgo_size = -0.8
	mine_rgo_eff = -0.6
}

cold_highlands_climate = # Ds warm highland
{
	farm_rgo_size = -0.1
	farm_rgo_eff = -0.05
	mine_rgo_size = 0.3
	mine_rgo_eff = 0.2
}

cold_humid_climate = # Df cold temperate humid
{
	farm_rgo_size = 0.2
	farm_rgo_eff = 0.15
	mine_rgo_size = 0.2
	mine_rgo_eff = 0.1
}

temperate_oceanic_climate = # Cfb/Cfc temperate maritime
{
	farm_rgo_size = 0.4
	farm_rgo_eff = 0.25
	mine_rgo_size = 0.2
	mine_rgo_eff = 0.1
}

temperate_drysummer_climate = # Cs warm dry subtropical
{
	farm_rgo_size = 0.15
	farm_rgo_eff = 0.05
	mine_rgo_size = 0.1
	mine_rgo_eff = 0.1
}

temperate_subtropical_climate = # Cfa warm temperate humid subtropical
{
	farm_rgo_size = 0.5
	farm_rgo_eff = 0.3
	mine_rgo_size = 0.05
	mine_rgo_eff = 0.15
}

arid_cold_climate = # Bsk Cold Deserts
{
	farm_rgo_size = -0.45
	farm_rgo_eff = -0.5
	mine_rgo_size = -0.3
	mine_rgo_eff = -0.2
}

arid_climate = # Bwh Hot Deserts
{
	farm_rgo_size = -0.45
	farm_rgo_eff = -0.95
	mine_rgo_size = -0.3
	mine_rgo_eff = -0.2
	max_attrition = 5
}

semi_arid_climate = # Bsh Hot Steppes
{
	farm_rgo_size = -0.2
	farm_rgo_eff = -0.4
	mine_rgo_size = -0.05
	mine_rgo_eff = -0.1
	max_attrition = 3
}
